ComicInfo.Title: Curtain Call Part 4 of 5; Event Horizon Chapter 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
Event Horizon (3 of 4)! Robotech's epic event approaches its climax, as classic characters clash and fall! With an extra story by Brenden Fletcher (Isola, Motorcrush) and artist Sarah Stone (Netflix's Castlevania)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jeff Spokes | 1 | B | Vehicle Action Figure Cover B (Miriya's Battle Armor - Zentraedi Enemy) | Blair Shedd | 2 | C | Cover C | Nick Brokenshire | 3 |
